biography_text: LAMB, Conor, a Representative from Pennsylvania; born on June 27, 1984; graduated from Central Catholic High School, Pittsburgh, Pa., 2002; graduated from University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, Pa., 2006; J.D., University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, Pa., 2009; United States Marine Corps; United States Marine Corps Reserve; assistant United States attorney for the Western District of Pennsylvania, 2014-2017; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Timothy Murphy (March 13, 2018-present).
